https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bhN5Ya8FG3pP28lq6NbMe3gHBgn.jpg In a tourist resort on the northern coast, Dr. Yahya decides to spend the holiday with his wife Magda before the coast gets crowded . The two are introduced to a recently divorced translator and a mother of two called Hala . Before the Summer Crowds
